content.en: Immune cell analysis: Researchers are using algorithms to investigate the role of immune and stromal cells in lung adenocarcinoma and their potential as prognostic factors. The ESTIMATE algorithm is being employed to identify prognostic genes and develop immune-related prognostic models and signatures. Additionally, the Estimation of STromal and Immune cells in MAlignant Tumors using Expression data algorithm is being used to identify tumor microenvironment-related genes of prognostic value. These findings could help improve the prognosis and treatment of lung adenocarcinoma patients.
content.da: Immuncelle-analyse: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at undersøge rollen af immune og stromale celler i lungeadenokarcinom og deres potentiale som prognostiske faktorer. ESTIMATE-algoritmen anvendes til at identificere prognostiske gener og udvikle immunrelaterede prognostiske modeller og signaturer. Desuden bruges algoritmen Estimation of STromal and Immune cells in MAlignant Tumors using Expression data til at identificere tumormikromiljø-relaterede gener af prognostisk værdi. Disse resultater kan bidrage til at forbedre prognosen og behandlingen af patienter med lungeadenokarcinom.
